summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal lighting and power system; declaring the estimated cost thereof as near as may be, and providing for the issuance and sale of utility revenue bonds to provide funds therefor; creating and establishing a special fund designated "Municipal Light Extension Bond Fund 1958" to pay the principal and interest of such bonds; and providing for the issuance of like bonds in the future on a parity with the bonds authorized herein, as contemplated by Ch. 231, Laws of Washington, 1953.
